body: No, it's not a low res scan. The actual scan has 6MB's each page and the uploader just simply linked 2 pages together in 1 long page. So the problem is, the nhentai server JUST RE-SCALED DOWN the resolution on ALL pages. That's why it looks like low res ones when you check each page.
Why upload garbage scans?  No will even touch these scans for any sort of translation, if that is what you are hoping for.
